title: Diamond Cut Kada - "Vajrala Kadiyam"
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Contemporary zigzag design featuring bezel-set, brilliant-cut diamonds. The angular design is a modern interpretation of traditional bangles (Kadiyam), creating a striking geometric pattern. Gold is hand-hammered for added strength.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: and everyday wear. Perfect for adding a touch of modern elegance to traditional attire or complementing contemporary outfits.
description: A fusion of modern aesthetics with the timeless appeal of gold and diamonds. This Kada (Kadiyam) is a statement piece that showcases exceptional craftsmanship and adds a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. The brilliance of the diamonds is enhanced by the Hyderabadi Polish, ensuring a lasting shine.
